TopicTitle: SCF Home base + 7/8/15 Spacecraft friday [Looking for you!]

Articles.Content:
> 
> Hey MRS,
> Can I do one at some stage? I think I'd enjoy the challenge. ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)

>

> 
> The Replica Guy

I'll put you on the OP list. Go right ahead and start something like this on the RBers.

> 
> It looks like my U-Boat won't be ready in time for this week's SCF, especially since Yukon's doing it, Friday night for him is either Thursday night or Friday morning for me. And since I appear to be doing it next week, the U-Boat is going to have to be held back another week so it has a chance of being featured.
> Hell.

Don't worry, there's always next week!

Here's my sky crane.

**Edited <time datetime="2015-09-10T23:27:59Z" title="09/10/2015 11:27  PM" data-short="8 yr">September 10, 2015</time> by Azimech**
Hey I've posted my SCF.

Here's the Z-50: [http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/133402-Z-50-Cobra-Stock-Swivel-Jet-VTOL-F-35B-Replica%21](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/133402-Z-50-Cobra-Stock-Swivel-Jet-VTOL-F-35B-Replica%21)

And some pics:

![NBbQRDF.png](http://i.imgur.com/NBbQRDF.png)

![WycZ1Wq.png](http://i.imgur.com/WycZ1Wq.png)

Got passed over two weeks in a row. It'd be awesome if it was featured on SCF. ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)
Sorry Giggle, mustave missed that one, it looks fantastic.

> 
> Sorry Giggle, mustave missed that one, it looks fantastic.

I tested it, works great and is stock!
Damnit, I'm out of ideas on what to do next..
I'll throw my name in the hat as a maintainer one week.

> 
> I'll throw my name in the hat as a maintainer one week.

Added!

In case anybody needs to know for last minute releases and such, I will attempt to release this week's SCF at 5:00pm, US Central Time Zone, tomorrow. It may be later than that depending on how much work I end up with tomorrow afternoon, but I promise it won't be before 5:00pm.

Also, if there's a particular craft that anybody wants me to see that I may not have seen, let me know. I want to make sure everybody gets a fair chance.
I'll upload my ALRM1-A soon with improved aerodynamics. Doing my own Elcano challenge, currently the ALRM1 is driving towards the pyramids, must've been already 800 km or more since leaving KSC.

I have a little something which I'll try to get out the door tomorrow, but don't worry if you don't see it:

![rhL6BI3.png](http://i.imgur.com/rhL6BI3.png)

Download is up!

> [Javascript is disabled. View full album](//imgur.com/a/3Wt4F)

[http://kerbalx.com/crafts/5327](http://kerbalx.com/crafts/5327)

Built a new more realistic looking space shuttle from the ground up using what I had learned from building my older "Khallenger"

This new shuttle will be named "Kerlantis" after the real life Atlantis. I might not have it officially on the forum by Friday but it depends on how busy I am. 

![FDGG3rs.jpg](http://imgur.com/FDGG3rs.jpg)

**Edited <time datetime="2015-09-18T00:33:56Z" title="09/18/2015 12:33  AM" data-short="8 yr">September 18, 2015</time> by Jon144**

Sorry guys, I'm going to be postponed for a few hours, family wants to go out to eat. I'll see if I can get it out by 7:00, but I can't make any promises.

EDIT: I suppose I had better at least give a quick status update to make up for being late.

I've got five potential selections so far, I would really like more, so if you know of a thread I probably missed (Maybe something that was posted on Sunday/Monday and is way down at the bottom of the page) be sure to send me the link to it so I can check it out. If I can get more, I'm going to list the top five craft, as well as two honorable mentions. If I can't find any more candidates, I might have to pick a top three and two honorable mentions or just do a top five and forgo Honorable Mentions entirely. Another thing to know, I won't be listing two craft by the same builder in the top five/three list.

**Edited <time datetime="2015-09-18T22:18:37Z" title="09/18/2015 10:18  PM" data-short="8 yr">September 18, 2015</time> by pTrevTrevs**

You know you can use stuff that was just mentioned, not just submitted from the last week?

> 
> You know you can use stuff that was just mentioned, not just submitted from the last week?

Yeah. My shuttle is pretty much finished it is just I am too busy IRL to make a full forum post about it right now.

> 
> You know you can use stuff that was just mentioned, not just submitted from the last week?

Yeah, I remember hearing something about posts being eligible if a comment had been made in them within the week, and I've seen those, but I was talking about some threads that were posted at the beginning of the week but haven't had any posts in them since maybe Monday or Tuesday, and are at the bottom of the front page or on to the second page. Those can be easy to miss, and I want to make sure I get a chance to see every craft posted this week.

> 
> Yeah. My shuttle is pretty much finished it is just I am too busy IRL to make a full forum post about it right now.

I mean submitted craft with new forum posts from the last week

Well, I hate myself a little bit for being so late, but I have some good news, I'm on my way home, SCF will be up by 8:30 at the latest. I would say 8:00, but I don't want to make another estimate and have to move it back again. I've found some more craft, so I now have a list of about seven candidates. I'm starting to rank them by how well I like each one. Remember, folks, this is just my opinion and by no means a definite or official rating.
Alright, I'm working on uploading the thread, it should be up shortly.

> 
> Alright, I'm working on uploading the thread, it should be up shortly.

Good luck BB coding. From one maintainer to the next ![:D](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cheesy.gif)

> 
> Good luck BB coding. From one maintainer to the next ![:D](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cheesy.gif)

I'm having a little trouble embedding a video, but I hope it's the worst problem I have tonight!
I hope it goes well. The coding can take a while to learn.
You do know that you don't need to type out the BBcode, the little icons in the editor do the hard work for you.
